member.name: T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope
member.summary: Specifies the different scopes of a PNRP cloud.

member.name: F:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope.All
member.summary: All IP addresses are allowed to register with the PNRP . There is no difference between any scope and all scopes.

member.name: F:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope.Global
member.summary: The scope is global; all valid IP addresses are allowed to register with the PNRP .

member.name: F:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope.LinkLocal
member.summary: The scope is link-local; only IP addresses defined for the local area subnet are allowed to register with the PNRP .

member.name: F:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope.SiteLocal
member.summary: The scope is site-local; only IP addresses defined for the site are allowed to register with the PNRP.
